message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
Alice, $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $10,000.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this price point offers a fair deal for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $18,000 is still too much for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $14,000? I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement.
